_comment: ProxiCraft Configuration - Edit these settings to customize the mod
_rangeNote: How far away (in blocks) to search for containers. 15 = same room, 30 = small building, -1 = everywhere you can see
_storageSourcesNote: Which container types to pull items from
_coreFeaturesNote: Main features - what actions can use items from nearby containers
_reloadRefuelNote: Reload and refuel features - may need updates after major game patches
_uiFeaturesNote: Display features - show container items in the game UI
